block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is my Perfect Origami Heart. I designed this a really long time ago and I know you'll enjoy it. This is my thank-you to you my subscribers. I finally pass 100 subscribers and applied for a custom channel URL : https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart This Perfect Origami Heart is symmetrical left and right. It also looks the same from the back and the front. It is also able to stand. Please enjoy this Origami Heart, it is like no other. Below is the time stamp of the video: 0:00 Model Demonstration 0:12 Begin Folding, the Center of the origami Heart 2:08 Folding the inner corner of the origami Heart 4:55 Collapsing the Heart together 5:08 Folding the outer corner 6:00 Completed Perfect Origami Heart Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art
